name: Unfamiliar Space
description:
Unfamiliar Space

Walkthrough an unexplored planet, and find all of your spaceship's missing parts to fix it. Keep an eye on your oxygen and health.

This game is meant to be slow and difficult, so take your time to win.

Play on full screen for a way better experience.

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Attack and primary actions

F - Secondary actions

Tip

You can eat the berries plants for health.


Tileset credits: Psychronic

https://psychronic.itch.io/galacti-chrons-sci-fi-warehouse-tileset
